title: Optimize ESP Performance
description: A production engineer analyzes real-time data from an Electrical Submersible Pump (ESP) to optimize its frequency for maximum oil production without causing damage.

tasks.description: Retrieve real-time sensor data for the target well's ESP, including frequency, intake pressure, and motor temperature.
tasks.expected_outcome: Live data stream for the ESP is established and visualized.

tasks.description: Analyze the ESP performance curve against the current operating conditions to identify optimization potential.
tasks.expected_outcome: The engineer determines the optimal operating frequency.

tasks.description: Send a command to the SCADA system to adjust the ESP frequency to the new, optimized setpoint.
tasks.expected_outcome: The ESP frequency is successfully adjusted, and production rate increases.
